on reading compounds: 負荷【フカ】burden, load (e.g. cpu time, electricity, etc.)
正負【セイフ】positive and negative, +-, plus and minus
kun reading compounds: 負ける【まける】to lose, to be defeated, to succumb, to give in, to surrender, to yield, to be inferior to, to break out in a rash due to (e.g. lacquer, shaving, etc.), to reduce the price, to give a discount, to throw in (something extra) for free
負けるが勝ち【まけるがかち】he that fights and runs away may live to fight another day, sometimes you have to lose to win
負う【おう】to bear, to carry on one's back, to take responsibility for, to accept a duty, to receive (wound), to incur (damage), to be injured, to owe
負うた子に教えられて浅瀬を渡る【おうたこにおしえられてあさせをわたる】a fool may give a wise man counsel
